alert.note: Alert for Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Perry County through 630 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ned, or 10 miles southeast of Jackson, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lamont and Chavies around 610 PM EDT. Dice, Krypton and Ary around 615 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hazard and Bulan. THIS INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING HIGHWAYS... Hal Rogers Parkway between mile markers 52 and 59. Kentucky Highway 80 in Perry County between mile markers 9 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
